Source: ActionDescriptor.js

/**
 * This object provides a dictionary-style mechanism for storing data as key-value pairs. It can be used for low-level access into Photoshop. See an example of this usage in ‘Selection sample script’ on page 169.
 * 
 * Many configuration files use serialized action descriptors to represent their data. It is used, for example, to encapsulate playback options in Application.playbackParameters, and is returned by Application.getCustomOptions().
 *   
 * @constructor
 */
function ActionDescriptor() {

	/**
	 * Read-only. The number of keys contained in the descriptor.
	 * @type {number}
	 */
	this.count = 0;

	/**
	 * Read-only. The class name of the referenced actionDescriptor object.
	 * @type {string}
	 */
	this.typename = "actions";
}

ActionDescriptor.prototype = {

	/**
	 * Clears the descriptor.
	 */
	clear: function() {},

	/**
	 * Erases a key from the descriptor.
	 * @param {number} key
	 */
	erase: function(key) {},

	/**
	 * Creates a descriptor from a stream of bytes; for reading from disk.
	 * @param {string} value
	 */
	fromStream: function(value) {},

	/**
	 * Gets the value of a key of type boolean.
	 * @param {number} key
	 * @return {boolean}
	 */
	getBoolean: function(key) {},

	/**
	 * Gets the value of a key of type class.
	 * @param {number} key
	 * @return {number}
	 */
	getClass: function(key) {},


	/**
	 * Gets raw byte data as a string value.
	 * @param {number} key
	 * @return {string}
	 */
	getData: function(key) {},

	/**
	 * Gets the value of a key of type double.
	 * @param {number} key
	 * @return {number}
	 */
	getDouble: function(key) {},


	/**
	 * Gets the enumeration type of a key.
	 * @param {number} key
	 * @return {number}
	 */
	getEnumerationType: function(key) {},


	/**
	 * Gets the enumeration value of a key.
	 * @param {number} key
	 * @return {number}
	 */
	getEnumerationValue: function(key) {},

	/**
	 * Gets the value of a key of type integer.
	 * @param {number} key
	 * @return {number}
	 */
	getInteger: function(key) {},

	/**
	 * Gets the ID of the Nth key, provided by index.
	 * @param {number} key
	 * @return {number}
	 */
	getKey: function(index) {},

	/**
	 * Gets the value of a key of type large integer.
	 * @param {number} key
	 * @return {number}
	 */
	getLargeInteger: function(key) {},

	/**
	 *  Gets the value of a key of type list.
	 *  @param {number} key
	 *  @return {ActionList}
	 */
	getList: function(key) {},

	/**
	 * Gets the class ID of an object in a key of type object.
	 * @param {number} key
	 * @return {number}
	 */
	getObjectType: function(key) {},


	/**
	 * Gets the value of a key of type object.
	 * @param {number} key
	 * @return {ActionDescriptor}
	 */
	getObjectValue: function(key) {},

	/**
	 * Gets the value of a key of type File.
	 * @param {number} key
	 * @return {File}
	 */
	getPath: function(key) {},

	/**
	 * Gets the value of a key of type ActionReference.
	 * @param {number} key
	 * @return {ActionReference}
	 */
	getReference: function(key) {},

	/**
	 * Gets the value of a key of type string.
	 * @param {number} key
	 * @return {string}
	 */
	getString: function(key) {},

	/**
	 * Gets the type of a key.
	 * @param {number} key
	 * @return {DescValueType}
	 */
	getType: function(key) {},

	/**
	 * Gets the unit type of a key of type UnitDouble.
	 * @param {number} key
	 * @return {number}
	 */
	getUnitDoubleType: function(key) {},

	/**
	 * Gets the value of a key of type UnitDouble.
	 * @param {number} key
	 * @return {number}
	 */
	getUnitDoubleValue: function(key) {},

	/**
	 * Checks whether the descriptor contains the provided key.
	 * @param {number} key
	 * @return {boolean}
	 */
	hasKey: function(key) {},

	/**
	 * Determines whether the descriptor is the same as another descriptor.
	 * @param {ActionDescriptor} otherDesc
	 * @return {boolean}
	 */
	isEqual: function(otherDesc) {},

	/**
	 * Sets the value for a key whose type is boolean.
	 * @param {number} key
	 * @param {boolean} value
	 */
	putBoolean: function(key, value) {},

	/**
	 * Sets the value for a key whose type is class.
	 * @param {number} key
	 * @param {number} value
	 */
	putClass: function(key, value) {},

	/**
	 * Puts raw byte data as a string value.
	 * @param {number} key
	 * @param {string} value
	 */
	putData: function(key, value) {},

	/**
	 * Sets the value for a key whose type is double.
	 * @param {number} key
	 * @param {number} value
	 */
	putDouble: function(key, value) {},

	/**
	 * Sets the enumeration type and value for a key.
	 * @param {number} key
	 * @param {number} enumType
	 * @param {nunber} value
	 */
	putEnumerated: function(key, enumType, value) {},

	/**
	 * Sets the value for a key whose type is integer.
	 * @param {number} key
	 * @param {number} value
	 */
	putInteger: function(key, value) {},

	/**
	 * Sets the value for a key whose type is large integer.
	 * @param {number} key
	 * @param {number} value
	 */
	putLargeInteger: function(key, value) {},

	/**
	 * Sets the value for a key whose type is an ActionList object.
	 * @param {number} key
	 * @param {ActionList} value
	 */
	putList: function(key, value) {},

	/**
	 * Sets the value for a key whose type is an object, represented by an Action Descriptor.
	 * @param {number} key
	 * @param {number} classID
	 * @param {ActionDescriptor} value
	 */
	putObject: function(key, classID, value) {},

	/**
	 * Sets the value for a key whose type is path. 
	 * @param {number} key
	 * @param {File} value
	 */
	putPath: function(key, value) {},

	/**
	 * Sets the value for a key whose type is an object reference.
	 * @param {number} key
	 * @param {ActionReference} value
	 */
	putReference: function(key, value) {},

	/**
	 *  Sets the value for a key whose type is string.
	 *  @param {number} key
	 *  @param {string} value
	 */
	putString: function(key, value) {},

	/**
	 *  Sets the value for a key whose type is a unit value formatted as a double.
	 *  @param {number} key
	 *  @param {number} unitID
	 *  @param {number} value
	 */
	putUnitDouble: function(key, unitID, value) {},

	/**
	 * Gets the entire descriptor as a stream of bytes, for writing to disk.
	 * @return {string}
	 */
	toStream: function() {}
};

module.exports = ActionDescriptor;
